oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Public Relations for the Bovine Practitioner
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Meloy, Chandler
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Public Relations: (External) Using the total skills of communication to provide information and education to the general public-through media, in personal contact, and with the written or spoken word-and providing training and counsel to D VMs in communication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1975; 151-155
